Articles.Content:
The A-18 Dart is a VTOL jet i designed for short to medium range payload delivery jet, and while its admittedly not the most practical jet, being only able to reach 800 mps in the upmost of the atmosphere, i made it partly to look good and partly to prove to myself i could make a decent VTOL, so, enjoy!

http://www./download/m21qxta95b214sa/A-38_Dart.craft
